Package blackjack

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    BlackChip
    The Class BlackChip.
    Card
    The Class Card.
    Chip
    The Class Chip.
    CollectionOfCards
    This class has a LinkedList storing objects of type Card.
    Dealer
    This class has associated three classes.
    Debug
    This class extends an abstract class "Mode".
    Game
    This class extends the abstract class GameType and implements the methods inherited from the super class, in order to provide information in the terminal about the actions and everything related to the game.
    GameSimulation
    This class extends an abstract class GameType.
    GameType
    This abstract Class has a Player, a Dealer, a Strategy, a Shoe, a Junk, a Statistics, some Boolean variables to indicate states and an Integer variable.
    GreenChip
    The Class GreenChip.
    Hand
    This class inherits the class CollectionOfCards and also has two parameters: int total and boolean handCanBeHit.
    Interactive
    This class extends an abstract class "Mode".
    Junk
    This class extends CollectionOfCards and it's used to store temporarily the used cards.
    Mode
    This class implements an abstract class "Mode" that implements a common method for all the "child" classes.
    PileOfChips
    The Class PileOfChips.
    Player
    This class represents a player of blackjack, that has Player has two lists: the list of Hands and the list of bets.
    RedChip
    The Class RedChip.
    Shoe
    This class inherits CollectionOfCards and has a parameter shufflecount that stores the number of shuffles performed to the list of cards during the game.
    Simulation
    This class extends an abstract class "Mode".
    Statistics
    This class has ten parameters that contain informations about one game of blackjack.
    Strategy
    This class implements a a tool that through an algorithm is capable of giving an advice based on different strategies.
    WhiteChip
    The Class WhiteChip.
